message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $14,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and features.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to come down to $12,000. This is my best offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but I'm still thinking $9,500 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be within my budget.
